examples.text: About Lemonade: Lemonade (NYSE: LMND) is a digital insurer built on AI and social impact, offering renters, homeowners, car, pet, and life insurance in the U.S. and Europe. Lemonade donates unused premiums to nonprofits chosen by customers through its annual Giveback.
We’re rolling out faster claim decisions—powered by our AI—so more customers get paid in minutes, with zero paperwork.
examples.notes: Customer-facing voice; short, benefit-led; no salesy hype.
